Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22918 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-22918 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.2.2-4, affected by CVE-2021-22918
